sentences.english: I have friends who, I suspect, secretly scoff at my mild work-out routines.
sentences.chinese: 我疑心有幾個朋友偷偷嘲笑我溫和的鍛鍊程序。

sentences.english: Sucre stands at the toilet but it won’t flush.
sentences.chinese: Sucre發現馬桶不能沖水了，起了疑心。

sentences.english: Lost pendant BaiXi bad words after the start time, BaiXi suspicious huimei.
sentences.chinese: 丟了吊墜後的白熙壞音訊不時，白熙開端疑心惠美。

sentences.english: She is more likely to be suspicious.
BILL: I suspected something right away.
But the move has provoked up sister wang was new to the field shu suspicious.
sentences.chinese: 不過王姐的舉措卻惹起了舒新對田野的疑心。

sentences.english: Don't let evil thoughts or doubts make any of you turn from the living God.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓邪惡的意念和疑心，使你們離棄了永活的上帝。

sentences.english: Diffidence is the poison of true friendship.
I have no doubt about the thing she mentioned yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我對她昨天所提起的那件事完全沒起疑心。

sentences.english: Finn suspicious pushed her downstairs accomplishment is the mystery man to the police JOEY and persistently heckled him ever since.
sentences.chinese: 淑芬疑心推她下樓的神祕人是JOEY並向警方落案。

sentences.english: There's no suspicion of being shadowed so far.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，好像還沒有疑心到有人窺伺。

sentences.english: For a moment she suspected herself of having committed an indecency.
sentences.chinese: 有一會兒，她疑心自己做了什麼不體面的事。

sentences.english: His co-worker calls him out on his sales reports and accuses him of fraud.
sentences.chinese: 他的同事對他的銷售報告起了疑心，指責他做假。

sentences.english: Because I'd suspected Seven of dropping it into the brook and not liking to tell me.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我總疑心這東西是老七掉到溪裏，不好意思說明。

sentences.english: Customs officers are suspicious of nervous-looking travellers.
sentences.chinese: 海關官員對那些神情緊張的旅客起疑心。

sentences.english: Just the fact that I limped made him suspicious.
sentences.chinese: 就憑我走路一瘸一拐，他就會起疑心了。

definition: to be suspicious and jealous of
to treat sb favorably/to view in a new light
